name: Raf R's Pocked Abstract Art Machine
name_original: Raf R's Pocked Abstract Art Machine
description:
a unique one screen art program that draws art how you tell it to. part 5 of my art machines series. basically a stripped down and easier version of the twin named project excluding pocket from the title. does yield new art though.

SPACE to render, R to reset sliders, S to show and hide sliders and seeds, C to clear seeds list, Z to generate seed, and X to load seed.

"cool seeds" text file included in download

ps. this program along with art machines uploaded to this site very closely to each other were programmed at the same time but uploaded months after since I was busy working on school and new games.
